item.title: FIXBUX: A Web-extension to Safeguard Users from Themselves [Javascript]
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: Overview It would seem that people are becoming more conscious of behavior’s role in retaining, taking back, and even losing privacy. Privacy technology isn’t currently a solution to privacy issues, so it is becoming more important to consider how we interact with these technologies, and how we make decisions. We have a greater propensity to share when our friends share, when we trust the technology maintainers, and defaults surprisingly dictate the way we behave, so what happens when you opt-in, by default, to share your social network data with a host of third parties?
